item.title: Experience personalized lighting effects with Philips Hue Play
item.description:
Source: Signify. Philips Hue Play light effects now available in Singapore. Signify, a company specializing in lighting solutions, has introduced the Philips Hue Play to the Singapore market. This compact light bar is designed to create an immersive atmosphere with its adaptable placement options. The Philips Hue Play can function independently as an indirect light source, serving as backlighting or accent lighting. Using Philips Hue Sync, a software available for both PC and Mac computers, users can synchronize the Hue Play with on-screen content, such as movies, video games, or music...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-personalized-lighting-effects-with-philips-hue-play/

item.title: The Ultimate Gadget Gift Guide for Christmas 2017
item.description:
As 2017 comes to a close, treat yourself to a range of exciting new gadgets! WorkSmart Asia presents its top picks for this year, featuring: Limited Edition Star Wars Shavers Source: Philips Singapore. Philips limited edition shavers, inspired by Star Wars. From left: the Poe Dameron-inspired Philips _Star Wars _Shaver SW6700/14; the BB-8-inspired SW5700/07 and the Stormtrooper-inspired SW170/04. Philips introduces a new line of limited-edition shavers inspired by iconic Star Wars characters...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-ultimate-gadget-gift-guide-for-christmas-2017/
